title: The Pastoral balance
creator_credit: Ian Hart, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Shows some of the features of the Australian beef cattle industry, concentrating on recent advances in breeding and pasture improvement. Examines modern pastoralism in terms of a systems approach, the inputs being land, livestock, capital and labour, and the outputs beef and modification of the environment.
